title: Touro Synagogue National Historic Site: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           85 Touro Street  Newport, RI 02840                 Directions         For direction information please visit: http://www.tourosynagogue.org/visit/directions  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Touro Synagogue National Historic Site The Touro Synagogue Congregation manages the operations of the facility and operating hours can be found on Tourosynagogue.org/visit/hours-tours-tickets   Standard Hours    Sunday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Monday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Tuesday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Wednesday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Thursday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Friday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Saturday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM             Weather           Summer temperatures range from 56-83F. Fall temperatures range from 30-70F. Winter temperatures range from 20-45F. Spring temperatures range from 30-70F.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Touro Synagogue Admission - $12.00 The Touro Synagogue Congregation manages the operations of the facility and admission pricing can be found on Tourosynagogue.org/visit/hours-tours-tickets         Visitor Centers              Â        Welcome to the Touro Synagogue in Newport, Rhode Island.
